sen.j: 源 弘（みなもと の ひろむ、弘仁3年（812年）- 貞観 5年1月25日（863年2月16日））は、平安時代前期の公卿。
sen.e: MINAMOTO no Hiromu (812 ~ February 16th, 863) is a court noble of the early Heain period.
MINAMOTO no Hiromu (812 ~ February 16th, 863) was a court noble during the early Heain period.
MINAMOTO no Hiromu (812 - February 16, 863) was a court noble during the early Heian period.
sen.cmt: ~を-に訂正しました。th削除HeainをHeianに訂正しました。

sen.e: He is a prince of Emperor Saga.
He was the prince of Emperor Saga.
He was the prince of Emperor Saga.

sen.j: 814年（弘仁5年）に源朝臣姓を賜る。
sen.e: In 814, he was bestowed a surname of MINAMOTO Asomi.
In 814, he was bestowed the surname of MINAMOTO Asomi.
In 814, he was bestowed the surname of MINAMOTO Asomi.

sen.j: 828年（天長5年）に従四位下、以降宮内卿、刑部卿などを歴任し、842年（承和 9年）に参議になる。
sen.e: He was designated to Jushiige (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade) in 828, and posted Kunaikyo (Minister of the Ministry of the Sovereign's Household) and Gyobukyo (Minister of the Ministry of Justice), and later became a Sangi (Royal Advisors) in 842.

He was designated Jushiige (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade) in 828, and assigned as Kunaikyo (Minister of the Ministry of the Sovereign's Household) and Gyobukyo (Minister of the Ministry of Justice), and later became a Sangi (Royal Advisors) in 842.

He was designated Jushiige (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade) in 828, and assigned as Kunaikyo (Minister of the Ministry of the Sovereign's Household) and Gyobukyo (Minister of Justice), and later became a Sangi (Royal Advisors) in 842.
sen.cmt: OK宮内卿、刑部卿、訂正しました。

sen.j: 848年（嘉祥元年）中納言に転ずる。
sen.e: In 848, he was transferred to Chunagon (Middle Counselor.)
In 848, he was transferred to Chunagon (Middle Counselor.)
In 848, he was transferred to Chunagon (vice-councilor of state.)
sen.cmt: "Middle Counselor" -> "vice-councilor of state" に変更しました。

sen.e: In 859, he was promoted to Dainagon (Major Counselor.)
In 859, he was promoted to Dainagon (Major Counselor.)
In 859, he was promoted to Dainagon (chief councilor of state.)
sen.cmt: "Major Counselor" -> "chief councilor of state" に変更しました。

sen.j: 863年（貞観5年）当時流行していた咳逆病によって死去。
sen.e: In 863, he died of Gaigyaku-byo (enzootic fever) occurred in epidemics at the time.
In 863, he died of Gaigyaku-byo (enzootic fever) that occurred at the time.
In 863, he died of enzootic fever that occurred at the time.
sen.cmt: 病名の読みは不要と考えましたので、削除。

sen.j: また、音楽や学を好んでいた。
sen.e: He loved music and was academically oriented.
